column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////1. Nutella bread - 4/5 This is a pastry that is a biscuit on the outside and filled with nutella on the inside.  It also has a few crunchy chocolate beads on top.  It is my favorite one so far at Common Bond but I realized it's because I love nutella.  I did not think the pastry that holds the nutella is special at all.  It is neither crunchy nor moist nor perfectly baked.  However
column2: the crunchy chocolate beads on top were incredible
column3: and really made this my favorite pastry.
